about_the_game:
Play a simulation game while learning grammar!

You will play as a fresh graduate of theoretical mathematics who made grammar your fiftieth(ish) priority to learn (just after lighting a fire with teeth). Because of some mixed-up, now you are working as a grammar validator in the biggest grammar validation agency.

Use your grammar and management skills to work your way up from the “Junior Passable Intern” to “Editor Extraordinaire.” Find and correct grammatical mistakes in documents, learn new grammar rules, and beat your colleagues in a grammar battle. If you are doing well, you can upgrade your crummy apartment, adopt a pet, or ride a helicopter to the office. Everything is possible in Grammarian ltd.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-3337U or AMD A6-5200 (~2GHz Processor or higher)
  • Memory: 2048 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720 / AMD Radeon HD 6570 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G (~3GHz+ or better)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/ AMD Radeon RX 580 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Welcome to 2099, where all communication must use correct grammar. Use your grammar and management skills to work your way in biggest grammar validation agency in Grammarian Ltd.
